YouTube  
No

Description

Represents the YouTube video subscription flavor of an Atom entry

Methods

__construct, getCountHint, getDOM, getFeedLink, getMediaThumbnail, getPlaylistId, getPlaylistTitle, getQueryString, getUsername, setFeedLink, setPlaylistId, setPlaylistTitle, setQueryString, setUsername, takeChildFromDOM,

__construct( DOMElement   $element = null, ) : n/a

Description

Creates a subscription entry, representing an individual subscription in a list of subscriptions, usually associated with an individual user.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$element DOMElement | (optional) DOMElement from which this object should be constructed. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

Return value

Type Description

Tags

Name Description
throws Zend_Gdata_App_VersionException

getDOM( DOMDocument   $doc = null,   $majorVersion = 1,   $minorVersion = null, ) : DOMElement

Description

Retrieves a DOMElement which corresponds to this element and all child properties. This is used to build an entry back into a DOM and eventually XML text for sending to the server upon updates, or for application storage/persistence.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$doc DOMDocument | The DOMDocument used to construct DOMElements null
$majorVersion n/a 1
$minorVersion n/a null

Return value

Type Description
DOMElement The DOMElement representing this element and all child properties.

getFeedLink( string   $rel = null, ) : mixed

Description

Get the feed link property for this entry.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$rel string | (optional) The rel value of the link to be found. If null, the array of links is returned. null

Return value

Type Description
mixed If $rel is specified, a Zend_Gdata_Extension_FeedLink object corresponding to the requested rel value is returned if found, or null if the requested value is not found. If $rel is null or not specified, an array of all available feed links for this entry is returned, or null if no feed links are set.

Tags

Name Description
see setFeedLink
